items.sentence: Even though he lives next door, he doesn\'t even say hello to us.
Have you decided whether or not you\'re going to sell your house?
I can\'t count the number of times Tom has complained about that.
Can you imagine what would\'ve happened if we hadn\'t been there?
No matter how hard I try, I can\'t do it any better than she can.
She advised him to take a rest, but he didn\'t follow her advice.
I assume Tom will be the same as he was the last time we saw him.
I came across an article in the newspaper about your new project.
I crossed the equator for the first time on my trip to Australia.
This is the supermarket where we usually do most of our shopping.
